001package com.telos.loops.transport;
002
003import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Map;
006
007/**
008 * Represents an HTTP response from the transport layer.
009 *
010 * <p>This is an internal abstraction used by the SDK to decouple the public API from the
011 * underlying HTTP client implementation. Users typically don't need to construct these directly.
012 *
013 * @param status the HTTP status code (e.g., 200, 404, 500)
014 * @param headers HTTP response headers (immutable copy is created)
015 * @param response the response body as bytes (immutable copy is created)
016 */
017public record TransportResponse(int status, Map<String, String> headers, byte[] response) {
018
019  public TransportResponse {
020    headers = headers == null ? Map.of() : Map.copyOf(headers);
021    response = response == null ? new byte[0] : Arrays.copyOf(response, response.length);
022  }
023
024  @Override
025  public String toString() {
026    return "TransportResponse{"
027        + "status="
028        + status
029        + ", headers="
030        + headers
031        + ", response="
032        + new String(response, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
033        + '}';
034  }
035}
